mapper.sql: a.id AS id, a.label AS label, a.value AS value, a.type AS type, a.sort AS sort, a.description AS description, a.remark AS remark, a.status AS status, a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_time AS createTime, a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_time AS updateTime, a.del_flag AS delFlag
